subject: "Fireworks are for now, but friends are forever" — "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya
content:
Travelers \ (^ o ^) / ~

Today, we'd like to introduce to you the pyrotechnician from Naganohara Fireworks — Yoimiya!

She is the most skilled pyrotechnician in Inazuma and is known as the "Queen of the Summer Festival." In addition to being a craftsperson, she is also the "heroic sister" in the eyes of many children. No matter how big the problem is, Yoimiya always has a solution to save the day.

​

​

​

​

​

​

subject: "Lost Riches" Event: Trade Treasure for Mini Seelie!
content:
During the event, partner with the Treasure-Seeking Seelie to seek out treasure that can be exchanged in the Event Shop for one of the commemorative event gadgets: "Mini Seelie: Viola", "Mini Seelie: Dayflower", "Mini Seelie: Rosé", and "Mini Seelie: Curcuma"! Rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora can also be obtained!

〓Event Duration〓

Event Duration: 2021/08/06 10:00 – 2021/08/16 03:59

Event Shop Duration: 2021/08/06 10:00 – 2021/08/20 03:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

And complete the "Ritou Escape Plan" quest in the Archon Quest

〓Event Details〓

● Check the treasure map within Ulman's Treasure Book. Follow the map to reach the area where the treasure is buried. Ulman will mark out two new areas in this book each day, for a total of 14 treasure areas.

● While looking for treasure, you will also earn Iron Coins. Iron Coins can be traded with Ulman for Mini Seelie, Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.

● While searching for treasure, you might encounter a challenge. Once you complete the challenge, all participating players will obtain the rewards. Throughout the entire event, you may collect a total of three challenge rewards in other players' worlds.

● When unearthing treasure, you may sometimes also gain a special Treasure Map Fragment. If you are able to piece these fragments together, you may follow the hints given by that map to discover a Secret Trove. When you draw near to one such Secret Trove, you can summon the Treasure-Seeking Seelie and use the Seelie's reaction to help you locate the trove.

※ Upon completing Area 14, the Event Shop will open for the redemption of "Mini Seelie: Viola", "Mini Seelie: Dayflower", "Mini Seelie: Rosé", and "Mini Seelie: Curcuma." You can only redeem one of the four. Upon redeeming one of them, you will no longer be able to redeem for the other three. Each Mini Seelie can only be obtained once.

subject: Event Wish "Tapestry of Golden Flames" - Boosted Drop Rate for "Frolicking Flames" Yoimiya (Pyro)!

Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in the event wish to make your party stronger in combat!

2021/08/10 18:00:00 – 2021/08/31 14:59:59

〓Event Wish Details〓

● During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character ""Frolicking Flames"" Yoimiya (Pyro) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: "Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders" Event: Take part to obtain the event-exclusive namecard
content:
During the event, players need to take part in the Theater Mechanicus Stages and complete various event missions to obtain the namecard "Celebration: Wondrous Calculation" and Wondrous Talismans. Wondrous Talismans can be used to redeem for rewards in the Event Shop such as Primogems, Character Talent Materials, Character EXP Materials, and Mora.

〓Event Duration〓

Event Duration: 2021/08/12 10:00 – 2021/08/26 03:59

Event Shop Duration: 2021/08/12 10:00 – 2021/08/30 03:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan"

〓Event Details〓

● Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders has a total of 10 Stages. On the first day, 4 Stages will be available, and 2 Stages will be available every day for the next 3 days.

● Defeat opponents within a Stage to obtain Veneficus Points that can be used to build Mechanici as well as draw Wondrous Sticks. Wondrous Sticks are divided into 4 types, which can provide various buffs to the Mechanici, players, and enemies in the game.

● Complete the Theater Mechanicus Stages to obtain Mechanicus Mastery EXP to level up your Mechanicus Mastery. By leveling up, you can unlock new Mechanici and Wondrous Sticks.

● On the first day of the event, the maximum Mechanicus Mastery EXP that can be obtained is 3,000. Within the next 3 days, the limit will gradually be unlocked and increase. During the event, a total of 8,000 Mechanicus Mastery EXP can be obtained.

● During the event, you can obtain Wondrous Talismans by completing the Theater Mechanicus Stages and completing specific event missions. Wondrous Talismans can be used to redeem for rewards in the Event Shop.

● Theater Mechanicus is only available in Single-Player Mode or a two-player Co-Op session.

subject: "Theater Mechanicus: Stage of Wonders" Gameplay Details
content:
Thanks to the efforts of the Theater Mechanicus Representative Komakata, everyone's favorite game from Liyue is finally available in Inazuma. According to Komakata, in its latest iteration, the original gameplay of Theater Mechanicus has been expanded upon with more unique content...

Additionally, new missions have also been added to Divine Thunder. Complete them to receive BEP.

〓Event Duration〓

Event Gameplay Period: 2021/08/12 10:00 – 2021/08/26 03:59 (Server Time)

Event Shop Duration: 2021/08/12 10:00 – 2021/08/30 03:59 (Server Time)

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan"

〓Event Description〓

[Introduction to Theater Mechanicus Stages]

This event has a total of 10 Stages. On the first day, 4 Stages will be available, and 2 Stages will be available every day for the next 3 days.

Note: Travelers can attempt the challenge in Single-Player or Co-Op Mode, but Co-Op only supports two people at once.

During the challenge, characters are unable to deal damage to monsters, gain Elemental Energy, or unleash their Elemental Burst. However, they can stil use their Elemental Skills to infuse monsters with elements.

[Veneficus Mechanicus]

In order to resist enemy attacks during the Stage, Travelers must construct various Mechanici at predetermined positions.

Note: During Co-Op Mode, the maximum number of constructible Veneficus Mechanici is a collective limit that is shared between both players.

[Wondrous Stick]

During the challenge, Travelers can spend Veneficus Points to draw Wondrous Sticks which will give various buffs. You can draw up to 3 Wondrous Sticks for free per stage. Once the 3 draws are used up, you will be required to spend Veneficus Points to draw.

[Mechanicus Mastery]

Complete the various challenges to gain Mechanicus Mastery EXP and increase your Mechanicus Mastery Level. Higher Mechanicus Mastery will give you more Initial Veneficus Points, and also allows you to unlock more Mechanici and Wondrous Sticks.

On the first day of the event, the maximum Mechanicus Mastery EXP that can be obtained is 3,000. Within the next 3 days, the limit will gradually be unlocked and increase. During the event, a total of 8,000 Mechanicus Mastery EXP can be obtained.

subject: HoYoLAB Communications Room (Part 1)
content:
Knock knock...

With a knock on the door, the newly renovated HoYoLAB Communications Room welcomes its latest newcomer: a jellyfish with cat ears!

With the abundant features and content on HoYoLAB, in order to provide better services for its users, our staff has created an experimental assistant called Mimo to help with the maintenance and processing of community data and information. In the future, Mimo will serve as HoYoLAB's liaison.

Now, let's hand the time over to our newcomer, Mimo~

Yoho~

Hello, friends of HoYoLAB! My name is Mimo, HoYoLAB's new community liaison. Nice to meet you~

Today, Mimo is here with HoYoLAB's staff at the Communications Room to answer your burning questions~ It is said that there are some new features that will be announced. Let's check it out!

Q1: I'm already using the HoYoLAB application, but the app interface and the website interface are not the same. Will both interfaces be unified in the future?

A1: Yes. HoyoLAB is expected to be updated in September, when much of the design and features of the website will align with the application, preventing users from having vastly different experiences on the two platforms.

Q2: Right now, the HoYoLAB website is divided between two games: Genshin Impact and Honkai Impact 3rd, but the application only has content related to Genshin Impact. Will there be content related to Honkai Impact 3rd in the app after the update?

A2: Yes, don't worry~ After the update, Honkai Impact 3rd will be integrated into HoYoLAB's new application architecture. You will then be able to browse content from both Genshin Impact and Honkai Impact 3rd at the same time!

Q3: Currently, there are no Tavern and Hyperion sections in the application. Will they be added in the future?

A3: After this update, content from the Tavern and Hyperion sections will be displayed together on the homepage~ You can choose what you want displayed on the homepage based on your preferences. At the same time, after the update, the community will have new posting rules. Instead of being linked to a single section, posts will now be linked to games and categories. In addition, we have also added a number of topics for you to choose from~

Q4: When will there be a night mode?

A4: It's coming very soon! Currently, HoYoLAB is further optimizing the UI interface for the community, which includes the highly anticipated night mode!

Q5: Will HoyoLAB add content from miHoYo's Tears of Themis in the future?

A5: Of course~ Our staff is hard at work on adding Tears of Themis to HoYoLAB, and soon you will be able to view content related to Tears of Themis on HoYoLAB~

That's all for now from the Communications Room! Let Mimo know what you think in the comments section~

Mimo will continue to listen closely to your comments and feedback, and bring you the latest information as it becomes available!

A3: After this update, content from the Tavern and Hyperion sections will be displayed together on the homepage~ You can choose what you want displayed on the homepage based on your preferences. At the same time, after the update, the community will have new posting rules. Instead of being linked to a single section, posts will now be linked to games and categories. In addition, we have also added a number of topics for you to choose from~

Q4: When will there be a night mode?

A4: It's coming very soon! Currently, HoYoLAB is further optimizing the UI interface for the community, which includes the highly anticipated night mode!

Q5: Will HoyoLAB add content from miHoYo's Tears of Themis in the future?

A5: Of course~ Our staff is hard at work on adding Tears of Themis to HoYoLAB, and soon you will be able to view content related to Tears of Themis on HoYoLAB~

That's all for now from the Communications Room! Let Mimo know what you think in the comments section~

Mimo will continue to listen closely to your comments and feedback, and bring you the latest information as it becomes available!

subject: "Phantom Flow" Event: Complete the challenge and win Primogems
content:
Shousen, the master of Inazuma's Shinryuu, offers to help the Traveler initiate an imaginary, no-holds-barred fighting tournament, with a chance to win rewards for it.

〓Event Duration〓

2021/08/20 10:00 – 2021/08/30 03:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan" and the World Quest "Chisato's Letter"

〓Event Details〓

● From the first day onward, a new challenge will be unlocked each day. Each of these will have a "Shoden" and an "Okuden" mode. Shoden Mode features three difficulty levels: Normal, Hard, and Extreme. Completing it at a higher difficulty will automatically complete the lower difficulties. Okuden Mode only unlocks after completing Extreme difficulty in Shoden Mode.

● Each challenge has three completion criteria, and all of them must be completed for the challenge to be considered a success.

● Each challenge features unique Shinryuu Mechanics that have their own special effects. Take note of them and use them to your advantage during the challenges.

● During the event, adjusting your World Level will not affect the level of opponents in the challenge or challenge difficulty in general.

※ Phantom Flow is only available in Single-Player Mode.

subject: Version 2.1 Update Preview: Fishing Gameplay Details
content:
Dear Travelers~ Version 2.1 will introduce the long-awaited Fishing Gameplay. Let's see how it works~

​

​

Hold the Cast Rod button to enter aiming mode:

Let go of said button to flick your bait and hook out.

​

If your hook lands too far from the fish, its ability to attract them will greatly decrease.

If it lands too close by, the fish will be startled and will flee the scene.

When the fish are on the hook, press the Raise Hook button, or the fish might finish eating the bait and flee.

​

Once you've successfully raised your hook, the fish will start to struggle.

When the fish enters a struggling state, you can hold and release the Fish button to adjust your fishing line tension and keep it in the yellow Ideal Tension Zone.

Fishing progress will only increase if you stay in the Ideal Tension Zone. Otherwise, progress will drop.

Once progress is full, you will have successfully caught this fish.

​

​

Fish on the hook will sometimes enter periods of intense struggle. At this time, the speed at which line tension may change will be affected, and the Ideal Tension Zone will turn orange and start to fluctuate slightly.

If your fishing progress hits 0, the fish will try to escape. The Tension Zone will then turn red and start to fluctuate.

​

​

There are certain lively and more valuable specimens of each fish species known as Ornamental Fish, and Fishing Areas with such fish at them will have more obvious ripples effects.

​

​

That's all for now, but stay tuned for more information in the future, Travelers! See you next time~

subject: "Moonlight Merriment" Event: Take part and exchange for the event-exclusive claymore Luxurious Sea-Lord
content:
During the event, Travelers can complete quests in Moonchase Tales or take part in Moonlight Seeker and Trail of Delicacies challenges to obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Crown of Insight, Primogems, recipes, and more.

〓Event Duration〓

Quest Start Time

Moonlight Merriment: Part I

2021/09/27 10:00:00

Moonlight Merriment: Part II

2021/10/01 04:00:00

Gameplay Duration:

Path of Stalwart Stone

2021/09/27 10:00:00

Path of Gentle Breezes

2021/10/01 04:00:00

Path of Austere Frost

2021/10/05 04:00:00

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 28 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Chapter I: Act III - A New Star Approaches" and "Trulla Chapter: Act I - Mondstadt Gastronomy Trip"

〓Quest〓

Unlock Criteria:

Moonlight Merriment: Part I - Once the event begins, you can access the quest "Moonlight Merriment: Part I."

Moonlight Merriment: Part II - Festive Fever reaches 1,000

〓Cuisine Machine Test Run〓

Unlock Criteria: Complete "Moonlight Merriment: Part I"

● Complete the missions in Cuisine Machine Test Run to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mora, Recipe: Oncidium Tofu, Recipe: Rice Pudding, and Recipe: Braised Meat.

※ The Cuisine Machine Test Run quest cannot be initiated in Co-Op Mode.

〓Moonlight Seeker〓

Unlock Criteria: Complete "Moonlight Merriment: Part I" and "The Many Matters of the Moonchase Festival"

● During the event, when any of the gameplay stages Path of Stalwart Stone/Path of Gentle Breezes/Path of Austere Frost is available, exploration for the corresponding area in "Moonlight Seeker" will be unlocked simultaneously.

● During the event, Travelers can collect Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests in the designated area to advance the collection progress of the area.

● When the collection progress of the designated area reaches a certain level, you can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Weapon Ascension Materials, Primogems, and Festive Fever.

● During the event, Travelers can go to Linyang at Liyue Harbor every day to mark a portion of the uncollected Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests.

〓Trail of Delicacies〓

Unlock Criteria: Complete "Moonlight Merriment: Part I" and "The Many Matters of the Moonchase Festival"

● During the event, when any of the gameplay stages is available, the corresponding encampment challenge in "Trail of Delicacies" will be opened simultaneously. Complete the challenge to obtain Luxurious Sea-Lord (Claymore)'s refinement materials, Primogems, Mora, Talent Level-Up Materials, Character Level-Up Materials and Festive Fever.

● During the event, when any of the gameplay stages is available, players can offer up delicacies in the "Trail of Delicacies" interface. Once you have offered a certain number of gourmet dishes, you will obtain the corresponding Trail Comforts, which will provide a powerful boost to the battle.

〓Event Details〓

● During the event gameplay duration, enhancing Luxurious Sea-Lord (Claymore) yields a Weapon Enhancement EXP Bonus.

● 2021/10/12 03:59:59 Moonchase Charms will disappear after the event.

● Complete the missions in Cuisine Machine Test Run to obtain rewards such as Primogems, Hero's Wit, Mora, Recipe: Oncidium Tofu, Recipe: Rice Pudding, and Recipe: Braised Meat.

※ The Cuisine Machine Test Run quest cannot be initiated in Co-Op Mode.

〓Moonlight Seeker〓

Unlock Criteria: Complete "Moonlight Merriment: Part I" and "The Many Matters of the Moonchase Festival"

● During the event, when any of the gameplay stages Path of Stalwart Stone/Path of Gentle Breezes/Path of Austere Frost is available, exploration for the corresponding area in "Moonlight Seeker" will be unlocked simultaneously.

● During the event, Travelers can collect Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests in the designated area to advance the collection progress of the area.

● When the collection progress of the designated area reaches a certain level, you can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive claymore, Luxurious Sea-Lord as well as its refinement materials, Weapon Ascension Materials, Primogems, and Festive Fever.

● During the event, Travelers can go to Linyang at Liyue Harbor every day to mark a portion of the uncollected Moonchase Charms and Mystmoon Chests.

〓Trail of Delicacies〓

Unlock Criteria: Complete "Moonlight Merriment: Part I" and "The Many Matters of the Moonchase Festival"

● During the event, when any of the gameplay stages is available, the corresponding encampment challenge in "Trail of Delicacies" will be opened simultaneously. Complete the challenge to obtain Luxurious Sea-Lord (Claymore)'s refinement materials, Primogems, Mora, Talent Level-Up Materials, Character Level-Up Materials and Festive Fever.

● During the event, when any of the gameplay stages is available, players can offer up delicacies in the "Trail of Delicacies" interface. Once you have offered a certain number of gourmet dishes, you will obtain the corresponding Trail Comforts, which will provide a powerful boost to the battle.

〓Event Details〓

● During the event gameplay duration, enhancing Luxurious Sea-Lord (Claymore) yields a Weapon Enhancement EXP Bonus.

● 2021/10/12 03:59:59 Moonchase Charms will disappear after the event.

subject: "Hyakunin Ikki" Event: A team-switching combat challenge awaits
content:
During the event, take part in the free-for-all fighting tournament "Hyakunin Ikki" and show off your elegant combat skills by defeating opponents in tag teams of two characters. By reaching the target scores, Travelers can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive namecard style "Celebration: Ikki", Primogems, and more.

〓Event Duration〓

2021/09/02 10:00:00 – 2021/09/13 03:59:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

And complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan"

〓Event Details〓

● There are a total of six challenges in "Hyakunin Ikki," and a new challenge will be unlocked each day for the first six days of the event.

● During these challenges, you can use either the trial characters provided or your own characters to form 6 tag teams of two characters, and give each tag team an event-exclusive Garyuu Art.

● Garyuu Arts can provide buffs to the team on the field. Each team can be equipped with up to 2 Garyuu Arts.

● The challenge requires you to defeat opponents to score points within a limited time. Reach a specified high score in each challenge stage to obtain Primogems, Talent Level-Up Materials, Hero's Wit, Mystic Enhancement Ore, Mora, and other rewards. Accumulate the highest score in all stages and reach the specified value to obtain the namecard style "Celebration: Ikki."

● Cannot start the challenge while in Co-Op Mode.

※ Elemental Resonances will not take effect during Hyakunin Ikki challenges, nor will you be able to use food or other items.

subject: "Lunar Realm" Event: Go fishing and obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod!
content:
During the event, join Inazuman fisherwoman Kujirai Momiji on her journey to chase the moon, in pursuit of a legendary great fish called the "Lunar Leviathan." After completing a series of quests and challenges, you can obtain the event-exclusive fishing rod "Moonstringer," Primogems, Mysterious Fish Furnishing, and other rewards.

〓Event Duration〓

2021/09/10 10:00:00 – 2021/09/20 03:59:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan", unlock the Serenitea Pot System, and complete the "Exploding Population" quest given by Mondstadt's Nantuck

〓Event Details〓

● "Lunar Realm" has a total of seven fishing missions and special fishing training. For the first seven days of the event, one quest or special training will be unlocked each day.

● Special fishing training will take place at different times and locations. In order to complete the fishing training, Travelers need to choose a suitable fishing rod and bait at the corresponding fishing spot, and complete the specified special training objectives.

● To protect the fish species of Teyvat, a maximum of 50 fish can be caught in the training pool per day. All fish beyond that point will be released.

● When the bait used to catch the event-exclusive fish is used up, you can obtain it repeatedly by talking to Kujirai Momiji.

● During the event, after completing a series of missions and fishing training, you can obtain rewards such as the event-exclusive fishing rod "Moonstringer," Primogems, Mysterious Fish Furnishing, Hero's Wit, Sanctifying Unction, Mystic Enhancement Ore, and Mora.

subject: "Spectral Secrets" Event: Complete expeditions to obtain Primogems
content:
During the event, complete the "Spectral Secrets" expedition commissions to earn Primogem rewards. Depending on which characters you dispatch, you can also earn rewards such as Sanctifying Unction, Talent Level-Up Materials, Character EXP Materials, and even bonus rewards.

〓Event Duration〓

Event Duration: 2021/09/19 10:00:00 – 2021/09/26 03:59:59

Reward Collection Time: 2021/09/19 10:00:00 – 2021/09/29 03:59:59

〓Eligibility〓

Adventure Rank 30 or above

Complete the Archon Quest "Ritou Escape Plan" and the "Floating Spirits — The Investigation Begins" quest given by Inazuma's Katheryne

〓Event Details〓

● During this event, Katheryne of the Adventurer's Guild will release seven investigative expedition commissions for "Spectral Secrets" each day, of which you can select four.

● One S-rank commission, two A-rank commissions, and four B-rank commissions will refresh each day. S-Rank expedition commissions require you to complete the open-world challenge "Preliminary Investigation" first, after which you can initiate the expedition.

● For each commission, Travelers may enlist one character belonging to a friend on their friend list for every expedition in "Spectral Secrets" as a supporting character. Supporting characters will increase the chance of obtaining additional rewards. Supporting characters may be selected from any of the characters in a friend's Character Showcase.

● Travelers can recall dispatched characters. Recalled characters will not obtain rewards, but the number of dispatches consumed will be restored.

● Characters cannot be simultaneously dispatched to both regular expeditions and "Spectral Secrets" event expeditions.

subject: Event Wish "Epitome Invocation" - Boosted Drop Rate for Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and The Unforged (Claymore)！
content:
Travelers, stock up on weapons and characters in "Epitome Invocation" to make your party stronger in combat!

〓Event Wish Duration〓

After the Version 2.1 update – 2021/09/21 17:59:00

〓Event Wish Details〓

● During the event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star weapon Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) and the 5-star weapon The Unforged (Claymore) will receive a huge drop rate boost!

● During the event wish, the 4-star weapons Lion's Roar (Sword), The Bell (Claymore), Favonius Lance (Polearm), The Widsith (Catalyst), and Sacrificial Bow (Bow) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

● During the event wish, use Epitomized Path to chart a course towards a promotional 5-star weapon, such as Engulfing Lightning (Polearm) or The Unforged (Claymore). For more information on Epitomized Path, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

※ Of the above weapons, the event-exclusive weapon will not be available in the standard wish "Wanderlust Invocation."

※ For more information, go to the Wish screen and select Details in the bottom-left corner.

subject: A protector from afar with a loyal heart
content:
"Woof!" — Taroumaru

"What Taroumaru meant was that Thoma is very good at taking care of people and is a very good friend. But you can't just take care of others, you have to take care of yourself too... Wait, what are you laughing at! I was just translating what Taroumaru said!" — Gorou

Thoma

Protector From Afar

The Kamisato Clan's Housekeeper

Pyro

Rubeum Scutum

Thoma, who was born in Mondstadt, now lives in Inazuma, where he is the Kamisato Clan's housekeeper. He's also a well-known "fixer" in Inazuma.

Perhaps influenced by the relaxed and happy atmosphere of his hometown, Thoma is very good at socializing. Although he is an outlander, he has built an unexpectedly powerful network of people in Inazuma.

He is an affable person by nature and can easily get involved in various topics and establish relationships with various people. When it is time to defend the rights and interests of the Yashiro Commission, he will also put his smile away and show his serious side.

Occasionally, however, Thoma will sit alone in a corner of the Yashiro Commission and think about matters concerning himself.

He is an attentive, friendly, and sociable person who cares for all animals and comrades, but perhaps he also feels some unspeakable homesickness.
